definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: son of Cain Ge 4:17, Ge 4:17, Ge 4:18 LXX Enwx, LXXL Enwv.
son of Jered (line of Seth), the pious Enoch, who walked with God and was taken by him Ge 5:18, Ge 5:19, Ge 5:21, Ge 5:22, Ge 5:23, Ge 5:24, 1Ch 1:3 LXX Enwx.
[[חֲנׁךְ]] a son of Midian Ge 25:4, 1Ch 1:33, LXX Enwx.
[[חֲנוֹךְ]] a son of Reuben Ge 46:9, Ex 6:14, Nu 26:5, 1Ch 5:3, LXX Enwx.
